entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
